男誑し: (おとこたらし) - flirt; tease; promiscuous woman
男達: (おとこだて) - chivalrous man who helps the weak and fights the strong/knight in shining armor; ruffians who act under the pretence of being chivalrous
男雛: (おびな) - Emperor doll (in display with Empress doll)
男顔: (おとこがお) - masculine face (on a woman)
男鰥: (おとこやもめ) - widower; divorced man not remarried
男鰥に蛆が湧く: (おとこやもめにうじがわく) - Widowers are untidy; A man alone soon goes to seed; A man goes to pieces without a woman to look after him
町: (bairro/cidade) - town , town, block, neighbourhood, neighborhood; downtown, main street; street, road; 109.09 m
町おこし: (まちおこし) - revitalization of a town; town renewal (project)
町づくり: (まちづくり) - town planning; urban development; community development; creating a community
町の方針: (ちょうのほうしん) - town policies
町を貫く路: (まちをつらぬくみち) - road passing through the town
町を通る: (まちをとおる) - to pass through town
町バル: (まちバル) - street festival; street fair
町並: (まちなみ) - townscape; street (of stores and houses); (look of) stores and houses on street
町並み: (machinami) - townscape, street (de lojas e casas), (look of) stores and houses on street
町人: (まちにん) - townspeople; townsfolk; commoner; civilian; merchant; tradesman; tradeswoman; tradespeople; artisan; members of the lowest Edo-period social class (comprising commoners not involved in farming)
町人根性: (ちょうにんこんじょう) - (yoji) townsman's (independent) spirit; mercantile spirit
町人気質: (ちょうにんかたぎ) - (yoji) townsman's (independent) spirit; mercantile spirit
町人物: (ちょうにんもの) - novels or plays about the merchant class
町人風情: (ちょうにんふぜい) - (yoji) (the likes of) a mere tradesman
町全体: (まちぜんたい) - the whole town
町内会: (ちょうないかい) - neighborhood association; neighbourhood association
町制: (ちょうせい) - town organization; town organisation; town administration
町医者: (まちいしゃ) - physician in private practice; town doctor/doctor who served the townspeople (as opposed to the emperor, a daimyo, etc.)
町名: (ちょうめい) - name of a town or street
町営: (ちょうえい) - town management; municipal management
町域: (ちょういき) - most specific part of an address (postal term); neighbourhood
町奴: (まちやっこ) - persons organized into gangs and wearing flashy clothes, who styled themselves as "chivalrous men" (Edo period)
町娘: (まちむすめ) - town girl; girl raised in a town
町家: (ちょうか) - townhouse (i.e. house in the middle of a town)/traditional townhouse; tradesman's house (esp. a home with a shop in front)/merchant's house/merchant's family
町屋: (まちや) - townhouse (i.e. house in the middle of a town)/traditional townhouse; tradesman's house (esp. a home with a shop in front)/merchant's house/merchant's family
町工場: (まちこうじょう) - small factory in town; backstreet (small) workshop
町政: (ちょうせい) - town organization; town organisation; town administration
町村合併: (ちょうそんがっぺい) - merger of towns and villages
町村派: (まちむらは) - Machimura Faction (of the LDP)
町歩き: (まちあるき) - walking about town; stroll around town; walking the streets (e.g. for exercise)
町段畝歩: (ちょうたんせぶ) - units of square measure (for rice fields, forests, etc.)
町湯: (まちゆ) - public bath located in a city or town
町石: (ちょういし) - roadside stone distance indicators placed at intervals of one cho (approx. 109 meters)
町石卒塔婆: (ちょうせきそとば) - stupa-shaped stone distance indicators placed at intervals of one cho (approx. 109 meters) on a temple approach
町立: (ちょうりつ) - established by the town
町育ち: (まちそだち) - being raised in a town
町興し: (まちおこし) - revitalization of a town; town renewal (project)
町衆: (まちしゅう) - important local businessemen (in the Muromachi period); local leaders
町触れ: (まちふれ) - town order (Edo period); order issued by a shogun or daimyo affecting a whole town
町議: (ちょうぎ) - town councillor; town council member
町議会議員: (ちょうぎかいぎいん) - town councillor; town council member
町起こし: (まちおこし) - revitalization of a town; town renewal (project)
町道場: (まちどうじょう) - martial arts school situated in a town
町長: (ちょうちょう) - town headman; town mayor
画く: (かく) - to draw/to paint/to sketch; (えがく only) to depict/to describe; to picture in one's mind/to imagine; to form a certain shape (e.g. path of an action, appearance of an object, etc.)
画す: (かくす) - to draw (a line); to demarcate/to mark/to divide/to map out; to plan
画する: (かくする) - to draw (a line); to demarcate/to mark/to divide/to map out; to plan
画びょう: (がびょう) - drawing pin; thumb tack
画コンテ: (えコンテ) - storyboard (film, television); design for a series of movie scenes
画一思考: (かくいつしこう) - (yoji) uniformity of thought; uniform thinking
画像データ: (がぞうデータ) - image data; graphics data; digital image
画像パターン認識: (がぞうパターンにんしき) - pictorial pattern recognition
画像処理装置: (がぞうしょりそうち) - image processing equipment
画像劣化: (がぞうれっか) - image, video degradation
画像圧縮: (がぞうあっしゅく) - image compression
画像圧縮技術: (がぞうあっしゅくぎじゅつ) - image compression technology
画像情報: (がぞうじょうほう) - image information; image data
画像要素: (がぞうようそ) - picture element; pel
画像認証: (がぞうにんしょう) - verification by image (e.g. CAPTCHA); image authentication
